Item.Risk_Statement: Lack of consistent process to manage insider threats may result in an inability to respond to (detect and prevent) malicious insider activity.
Item.Description: The organization implements an insider threat program that includes a cross-discipline insider threat incident handling team.
Item.Example: The organization has an active insider threat program.
Item.State_Implementation: State implementation of this standard is incorporated into TAC 202.
Item.Testing_Procedures:
Obtain procedures addressing insider threat program and ascertain if:
(i) insider threat programs are implemented to detect and prevent malicious insider activity
(ii) a cross-discipline insider threat incident handling team is active
(iii) insider threat policies and implementation plans are established
